ranking_anomalies.name: Film Directors
ranking_anomalies.issue: Disproportionate representation of film directors in bottom ranks

assessment.brief_assessment: A generally solid historical ranking with strong representation of religious founders, philosophers, scientists, and political leaders. The list shows depth and nuance across different domains of human achievement.
assessment.subjective_impression: This feels like an intellectually ambitious attempt to map human historical influence that mostly succeeds but has some quirky, over-specialized sections.
